description:
You are the commander of an army but unfortunately you were captured by the enemies. By using your skills you have managed to escape them and now need to fight them off along the way to get to  your comrades. You are in a n x m grid and at the cell i,j there are arr [i][j] enemies, you have to reach the cell at nth row and mth column. On the grid you can travel along diagonally, vertically and horizontally  Calculate a path on which you will fight off the minimum amount of enemies and return that amount.

Input Format:

First line contains two space separated integers denoting the number of rows and columns of the grid.

The next 'n' line contains 'm' space separated integers denoting the number of enemies at each individual cell.

Output Format:

Return a single integer denoting the minimum number of enemies that you will have to  fight along the way.

Sample Input:

3 3

1 1 1

15 98 99

15 15 15

Sample Output:

61

Constraints:

1<= n <= 100

1<= ar[i][j] <= 100
title: Field Commander
